mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reservation (user_id, book_id, status, created_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{bookId}, #{status}, NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE reservation SET status = #{status} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM reservation WHERE book_id = #{bookId} AND status = 0 ORDER BY created_at ASC LIMIT 1
SELECT * FROM reservation WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND book_id = #{bookId} AND status = 0 LIMIT 1
SELECT r.*, b.title as bookTitle FROM reservation r LEFT JOIN book b ON r.book_id = b.id WHERE r.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY r.created_at DESC
